mapper.select: SELECT RING_CODE, RING_RESPONSE_ID, RING_REQUEST_ID, RING_TYPE, RING_NO, RING_MOVE_ADDRESS, RING_OCCUR_DATE, RING_CONFIRM_YN, RING_TITLE, USER_NAME REQUEST_NAME FROM RING INNER JOIN USERS ON(RING_REQUEST_ID = USER_ID) WHERE RING_RESPONSE_ID = #{user_id} ORDER BY RING_NO DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE RING SET RING_CONFRIM_DATE = SYSDATE, RING_CONFIRM_YN = 'Y' WHERE RING_CODE = #{ring_code}
